name: A lot of snakes!
description:
Short n' Sweet, Run-n'-Gun, 2D platformer!

In this short little platformer, make your way through three levels full of snakes to kill and platforms to jump!

Do not get hit!!

[Controls]

WASD or Arrow Keys to MOVE

SPACE or Z to JUMP

X or K to SHOOT

[Credits]

Design & programming - Goiaba Games

Graphics and Music by Jonathan Co (The Game Creators Asset Pack, look it up here on Itch.io)

Sound effects made with SFXR
